channel.title: New blog post on SkoHub PubSub
channel.description: Today, we finish our series on SkoHub with a post about SkoHub PubSub which is the component that adds ActivityPub features to SKOS concepts: http://blog.lobid.org/2020/06/25/skohub-pubsub.html

item.description:
Today, we finish our series on SkoHub with a post about SkoHub PubSub which is the component that adds ActivityPub features to SKOS concepts: http://blog.lobid.org/2020/06/25/skohub-pubsub.html
